NAME: Name
TUTORIAL_SLIDE1_TITLE: University of Massachusetts: Dartmouth CWGS Campus Saftey
TUTORIAL_SLIDE1_DESCRIPTION: Our goal is to end campus violence, and provide resources & information to victims.
TUTORIAL_SLIDE2_DESCRIPTION: With built in features such as emergency calling, and walk me home, we can help keep you out of harms way. Having this app in your arsenal lets you erridicate the fears of going out & enjoying our fine campus. Calling directly through our app gets you help faster by calling campus police directly.
TUTORIAL_SLIDE3_DESCRIPTION: We have provided answers to common questions regarding sexual assault to educate yourself. We want to assure any victims that help of all kinds is nearby, and direct you to those resources. Too often a victim feels trapped & alone, we are here to help, even if it feels minor.
TUTORIAL_SLIDE4_DESCRIPTION: We want to make our campus a comfortable, safe, and fun place to be. Knowing that your safe keeps your mind at peace.
WELCOME_INTRO: The starting point for your next great Ionic app
